data.text:

Woody Allen defends Spanish soccer head Luis Rubiales after unsolicited World Cup kiss: 'He wasn’t raping her'

Controversial film director Woody Allen has defended the actions of Spanish football president Luis Rubiales, who forced an unsolicited kiss on captain Jenni Hermoso at the Women’s World Cup final.

"I feel if you’re going to be canceled, this is the culture to be canceled by. I just find that all so silly," Allen said.
